accountType

Class MoneyMarket

  • java.lang.Object
    • accounts.Account
      • accountType.Savings
        • accountType.MoneyMarket

  • public class MoneyMarket
extends Savings
    The MoneyMarket class extends from the Savings class to give and hold specifics for a Money Market account. Maintains the functions of the Savings class while having its own interest rate, fee and loyalty check.
    Author:
    Jah C. Speed, Abe Vitangcol

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoneyMarket

        public MoneyMarket(Profile holder,
                   double balance)
        Constructs a Money Market account using the same parameters as the Savings class. The loyalty value is always set to be true.
        Parameters:
        holder - The person holding this account. balance The balance to make the account start with.

    • Method Detail

      • checkLoyalty

        public void checkLoyalty()
        Checks if this account is still considered loyal.

      • fee

        public double fee()
        Finds and returns the fee of this account.
        Overrides:
        fee in class Savings
        Returns:
        The monthly fee of this account given its loyalty.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Gets the Type of account this account is and returns it.
        Overrides:
        getType in class Savings
        Returns:
        The account type in a String format.

      • monthlyInterest

        public double monthlyInterest()
        Finds and returns the monthly interest of this account, depending on loyalty.
        Overrides:
        monthlyInterest in class Savings
        Returns:
        The loyal monthly interest rate if the profile is loyal, the regular otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Uses the Account method to make this account into a readable string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Savings
        Returns:
        The account type in the form of "Type::Holder::Balance $####.00::(CLOSED if closed)" along with the amount of times this account has done a withdrawal.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(double amount)
        Withdraws a specific amount from this account, then updates its loyalty.
        Overrides:
        withdraw in class Account
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to withdraw from this account.
